description: Sensor ID: Two letters and three digits. The first two letters indicate the trail or area.
Mountain range. 'CM': Chisos Mountains, 'DM': Davis Mountains, 'GM': Guadalupe Mountains
1: sensors has been removed, 0 or blank sensor is still present
Each humidity sensors has a paired temperature sensor.  This is the id of the pair (it can be paired with itself)
Latitude of sensor in decimal degrees
Longitude of sensor in decimal degrees
Notes on location such as species of tree sensor is in
